# installation
we offer ðŸŒƒ midnight (production release) and we also offer a unstable, untested, and experimental release called ðŸŒ… daylight (predev, betas, and release candidates) or also known as canary or pre-release.

## ðŸŒƒ midnight (recommended)
```bash
pip install midnight-engine
```

## ðŸŒ… daylight (unstable)
check github releases for the latest daylight version.
